Name: Mixx Island: Remix
About the game: Welcome to Mini Island! Mixx Island: Remix is a one small hold & Gun, boss Rush mini-game of Casual difficulty! This beautiful place was built only for simple fun! Choose the character and difficulty level that best suits you and enjoy a short, simple but colorful boss rush minigame! More About & Features Casual difficulty Hold & Gun and Boss Rush Simple Hit & Dodge Style Action. 4 types of 16 playable characters. 10 stages with 40 boss fights. Colorful and sparkling art graphics. 30 minutes to 45 minutes playtime
